ComicInfo.Penciller: Marat Mychaels,Mike Krome,Pasquale Qualano,Sean Damien Hill
ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Dark Shaman
ComicInfo.Summary:
Sela Mathers visits a campus as a guest speaker but little does she know that the campus is built upon an ancient American Indian burial ground. And a local Shaman will make sure that those who have desecrated his land will pay the ultimate price.
A brand new horror series from Zenescope Entertainment has arrived!
